title: Play
rank: High ( K, Q, J ... 3, 2, A ) Low

actions.text: After deal non-dealer can take from Discard. Refusal means dealer can take the card and begin. If neither take it, non-dealer begins as normal.
actions.title: Hand

actions.text: 1 card face up as discard pile.
actions.title: Discard

actions.text: Remaining cards form face down as stock.
actions.title: Stock

actions.text: 1 from Stock OR Discard. If the stock runs out, shuffle and reuse.
actions.title: Draw

actions.text: 1 card from hand face-up on Discard.
actions.title: Discard

actions.text: If player doesn't Knock, play continues.
actions.title: End of turn

actions.text: Player may Knock to end round if conditions are met. Player lays all cards face up.
actions.title: End of Hand

actions.text: All cards in hand are in either a Set or Run ('Melds'). Declare 'Gin'.
actions.title: Gin

actions.text: Cards in hand are in Melds and surplus cards ('Deadwood') not in any meld add up to 10 points or less
actions.title: Deadwood

actions.text: Defending player lays out Melds. Defender can Lay-off any cards to the Melds of the Knocker.
actions.title: No Gin

actions.text: Knocker gets 25 points plus Deadwood score from Defender.
actions.title: Gin

actions.text: Knocker subtracts Deadwood points from the Defender Deadwood points. Results is score for Knocker. If it is less than 0, points go to Defender plus 25 points Undercut bonus.
actions.title: No Gin

actions.text: When a player reaches target score.
actions.title: Game End
